sub_title: Assistant professor European Languages and Cultures
summary:
I am…

… an educator, cultural researcher and language expert.

… passionate about languages, teaching, intercultural exchange and cooperation.

… an experienced instructor of German and Swedish as a second language.

… an experienced lecturer of Northern European culture, politics and comparative literature.

I am passionate about working with people and languages. When teaching a language, structure and thoroughness are equally important to me as humour and playfulness. I go beyond a simple instruction of grammar and vocabulary and further intercultural understanding as well as motivate my students to explore their creativity and recover the fun in learning.

Specialties: teaching, strong social and communication skills, humour, languages – German, Swedish, English, Dutch, academic writing, comparative literature
